survey.Q2: patient [never] under what circumstances would you get a FDA approved vaccine
survey.Q3: patient hesitant about vaccines because [I think the government is controlling my mind]
survey.Q4: patient believes [side effects outweigh benefits], [worries about long term effect on health]

Q5.NEUTRAL: I vaccinated my children because I believe in protecting them and others in my community. It’s not just about personal choice; it’s about social responsibility to shield those who can’t get vaccinated, like kids with immune disorders.

Q6.AGREE: The body has a natural immune system for a reason. Overloading it with synthetic vaccines can disrupt its balance and lead to other health issues down the road.

Q7.AGREE: The rise in autoimmune diseases correlates suspiciously with the increase in vaccination schedules. I’m not saying vaccines are the only cause, but it’s a risk I’m not willing to take without more definitive answers.

endpoint.follow-up: patient opts for reminder in 1 month
